description: Welcome to your BRAND NEW 4 bed 4 bath almost 2700 sq/ft townhome. Nature's Edge is a boutique collection of master-built townhomes nestled into the heart of East Abbotsford. This bright and spacious layout is ideal for families, entertainers or anyone who enjoys spacious living. Quality constructed by a local reputable builder, this home is built to last! Features include: ICF foundations, full concrete party walls separating units from basement floor to top floor ceiling for the ultimate in privacy and comfort, 9' ceilings, chef inspired kitchen, double car garage + double car driveway, heat pump, gas range + fireplace and so much more! Ideally located to all levels of schools, hiking & biking trails, Clayburn Village, Lepp Farm Market and more. Call today!
